rhasspy_empty_search_query: The user did not provide a search query
rhasspy_error_unknown: Sorry, I do not know how to respond to that.
rhasspy_error_confused: I did not understand that, could you please repeat it?
rhasspy_wiki_query_not_found: We could not find any results for :query
rhasspy_wiki_query_error: There was an error while fetching results for :query
rhasspy_audio_query_builder_error: There was an error while capturing the search query
rhasspy_unknown_processing_error: There was an unknown error when processing your query.
rhasspy_empty_reminder_action: The user did not provide a text for the reminder
rhasspy_nlp_error: There was an error while parsing the content from the NLP server. Response - :response
rhasspy_reminder_set: Your reminder for: ":reminder" has been set
